columns.name: domain_name
columns.description: A string that represents the name of a domain.

columns.name: domain_id
columns.description: An internally generated unique identifier for a domain.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the search domain.

columns.name: created
columns.description: True if the search domain is created.

columns.name: deleted
columns.description: True if the search domain has been deleted.

columns.name: processing
columns.description: True if processing is being done to activate the current domain configuration.

columns.name: requires_index_documents
columns.description: True if Index Documents need to be called to activate the current domain configuration.

columns.name: search_instance_count
columns.description: The number of search instances that are available to process search requests.

columns.name: search_instance_type
columns.description: The instance type that is being used to process search requests.

columns.name: search_partition_count
columns.description: The number of partitions across which the search index is spread.

columns.name: doc_service
columns.description: The service endpoint for updating documents in a search domain.

columns.name: limits
columns.description: Limit details for a search domain.

columns.name: search_service
columns.description: The service endpoint for requesting search results from a search domain.
